01
The Successive Ageing
本課程旨在闡明老化過程的正向適應與經驗，也期使學習者能對老化具備更正向的思維與觀點，同時能體認程成功老化的意涵、理論及其可能的影響層面與因子，進而能應用相關正向健康促進策略協助老年長者達成健康老年生活目標。主要學習經驗包括探討成供老化的意涵、概念背景及發展、各國發展經驗與趨勢、相關影響成功老化層面因子等。學習者將透過課程講授與交互討論，研討相關成功老化理念、價值、原則與方法。(待修正)
The purpose of this course is to explain the positive adaptation and experience of aging process, hoping that learners would possess more positive thinking and perspectives toward aging while experience the meaning and the theory of successful aging and the possible aspects and factors affected, in order to apply relevant positive health promoting strategies to assist elderly to achieve healthier elderly living target. Major learning experiences include discussions on the meanings, concepts, backgrounds and development, development experiences and trends for a successful aging from various countries, as well as relevant factors that affect the aspects of successful aging.
全18週

The main objectives are to introduce the concept of rehabilitation care in long term care system, and the application of the assistive techonology device in long-term care services. Introduction to Long-term Care

Introduction to Research
本課程旨在提供學生基本研究知識與批判能力，了解理論與知識之建立依據，並建立應用科學方法探索問題與解決問題之基本概念，學生除了對長期照護實務現象能產生研究質疑，進而能了解各類研究設計及相關之研究信效度等基本概念或議題，同時經由研究文獻批判之小組討論提升團隊合作、批判性思考能力等，並能反思長期照護實務所面臨之情境或問題。(待修正)

Students  will have the opportunity for a systematic investigation on a long-term care topic by the student’s interest, and the student would need to demonstrating knowledge and skills on research methodology. This course provides student step by step to acquire research process as well as the critique on the research article.

Fundamental Care Practicum
本課程旨在增進學生的長期照護基本照護能力，透過熟練且適當地運用基本照護技術，促進長期照護機構住民的安全與舒適。於實習過程，學習者也可透過認識長期照護機構特性、工作內容、各專業服務人員之角色及長期照護資源，對現行長期照護機構運作模式能有進一步認識。
The course aim is to improve the students’ ability of basic care in long-term care field. To promote the safety and comfort for residents in long-term care facility through skilled and appropriate use of basic care techniques. In the internship process, learners can also learn about the characteristics of long-term care facility, job content, the role of professional service staff and long-term care resources, as well as understanding in advance the current care delivery mode in long-term care facility.

Long-term care practice techniques and experimental
本課程旨在強化學生長照實務導向之照護多元 觀點並落實於長期照護實務情境之應用。本課程擬將透過實務操作及演練， 提供學生增強長期照護實務知能與照顧技術。課程內容包括:講授與照顧 技巧相關的學理知識，並透過實際操作及演練各項技術，除針對照顧服務 員必考技術外，更提供學生在實務情境中常見的技術，培養學生熟悉實務 場域情境，並提升對長期照護服務之興趣。
The course aims to strengthen the current school student as practical oriented longterm care of multiple perspectives and practical to implement in the context of longterm care applications. The course intends to drill through the practical operation and provide students with practical knowledge and skills to enhance long-term care and services technology. In addition to this course introduces the concept of long-term care practice, principles and practical operating skills, but also provide students with implementation of network resources related, and training to familiarize students with practice-oriented method of use, and to achieve long-term care services in the future to deepen the meaning and application value.

Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

Program Designing and Evaluation in Health Promotion
本課程教學目的旨在關注：如何經由一套有系統的方案規劃方法、執行步驟與績效評核方式，以有效的進行長期照護健康促進方案與照護管理。同時也提供學生能理解方案規劃的內涵及計劃撰寫；本課程將透過情境案例分析與討論，使學生瞭解方案與長期照護日常生活密切緊扣重要性，並期能透過個案案例的解析，讓學生瞭解進康促進方案設計及妥適計畫的重要性。(待修正)

To allow students to further understand the need for program planning, different scenarios are constructed. Students can therefore understand how closely knitted the programs are with daily life and long-term care. Students will also learn the ways and steps in program design through case study.

International Long Term Care Practice
本課程旨在增進學生對國際長期照護實務現況之認識，擴展學生長期照護的國際視野及實務能力，藉由赴國際健康照護相關大學或機構進行課程研習、參觀長期照護機構及實習等活動增進學生對國際長期照護實務學習經驗，進而瞭解國際與台灣長期照護系統與服務模式之差異。
The course aim is to improve the students’ knowledge of international long-term care status as well as to expand students’ international perspective and ability regarding long-term care. For enhancing students' experience in international long-term care practice, students will participant a series of oversea activities such as lecture courses, visiting long-term care facilities, and internships which will be arranged by the cooperation University. In addition, students will understand the differences of long-term care systems and service models between Japan and Taiwan.

Long-Term Care Policy & Regulation／Legality
本課程旨在闡明長期照護相關之政策與法規。主要內容包括國內外長期照護 政策之演進、當前台灣長期照護之政策與法規，人力與財力資源及長照服務 人員之權利與義務。期能透過課室參與及對話，培養學生對長期照護政策與 法規之變動之關注度與敏銳度。
This course will focus on legal issues relevant to the operations of long term care providers across the continuum of care, including senior housing, assisted living, nursing facilities, Continuing Care Retirement Communities, and hospice and home health. These legal issues include licensure and accreditation, quality regulation and assurance, admission and discharge policies, reimbursement, and care coordination. We will discuss these issue from a policy context as well as through the statutory, regulatory, and case framework.

Biostatistics
本課程傳授學生基本的生物統計學(一)原理及其電腦 Excel 之示範/操作，佐
加計算機之示範計算，以使學生具備從事健康事業管理相關工作與初步電腦
統計函數及簡單統計繪圖之操作實務。課程內容包括生物統計學概念、敘述
教師代號：0520 統計學、機率概論、機率分布(Binomial, Normal, …)、抽樣分布、推論統計學
(估計)，與其相關電腦 Excel 實作。
The objective of this course is to provide students with basic theories of 
biostatistics I and simple calculation of Excel functions as well as simple figures 
drawing, a tool for the work in the health related fields. Students are trained to calculate 
some examples and homework by hand, calculator, and Excel. They are required to 
practice Excel in the computer classroom under the help of the instructor. They are 
expected to have sensitivity to the collected data, and have creative and logical 
thinking. 
 Subjects taught in this course include (1) basic concepts of biostatistics I, (2) 
descriptive statistics, (3) basic probability concepts, (4) probability distributions 
(Binomial, Normal, …), (5) sampling distributions, (6) inferential statistics: estimation, 
(7) related practice by Excel.

Philosophy and Religion
本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
This course is designed according to the vertical and the horizontal aspects of life. Guide students to understand the fundamental content of philosophy and religion, and focus on the various philosophical theories and religious teachings. "Birth, aging, sickness and death" and "oneself, humans, and subjects around one’s life" will be linked together in this course. The characteristics and values of human beings, human's desires and troubles, right and wrong, good and evil, and etc. will be explored. The attitudes on life, values, knowledge, ethics, morality, religion and life and death will be examined. For cultivating positive and active concept, students have to integrate his/her knowledge, feelings, and intentions. May they be happy and healthy and establish a good philosophical contemplation and religious reflection, and in an appropriate direction of life which profits both themselves and other lives through the learning of this course
全18週

Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。

Environmental Sustainability and Information Science
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
This course focuses on the importance of sustainable environmental development and information science. By integrating the application of information technology, this course aims to explain the importance of sustainable environmental development and to raise students' awareness of sustainable development in order to equip students with the ability to apply appropriate information technology and to develop the skills to maintain environmental sustainability.

The course covers topics such as environmental ethics, environmental change and disaster prevention, energy conservation and energy management, ecological conservation, computer programming, and information application integrated with environmental education themes. Teaching strategies include learning by doing, experiencing in real-life situations, cooperative learning methods, using sensory learning, exploring the environment, and integrating computer software applications.

cumulative learners by proper sequential practices

Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。

The cultivation of science education should begin way before children enter
elementary school. However, nowadays many preschool teachers do not possess enough
science knowledge or acquire systematic scientific trainings for them to design and
implement appropriate science curriculum for young children. As we know, teacher’s
Teacher’ s academic code：078
attitude toward certain course subject will influence how students look at the subject,
thus will affect their leaning results and related achievement. Therefore, it will be hard
for preschool kids to be able to enjoy science learning or to engage themselves in any
type of science experiments if their teacher does not like science at all.
This project intends to help college students in the department of infant and child
care (who will be preschool teachers after graduation) learn both basic science
knowledge and the design of science curriculum for young children. Furthermore,
students will have the opportunities to explore many real-life science experiments and
to practice their skills in designing scientific experiments for young children as they
attend basic science course plus advanced curriculum design course. In addition, they
will also have the chances to observe and learn from other college students as they
participate in the integrated preschool science-learning-activity design competition.
全18週

Professional Ethics are the moral commitments of a profession that involve moral reflection that extends and Teacher’s academic 0code:09460946 09466enhances the personal morality practitioners bring to their work, that concern actions of right and wrong in the workplace, and that help individuals resolve moral dilemmas they encounter in their work. Childhood is a 
unique and valuable stage in the human life cycle. Our paramount responsibility is to provide care and 
education in settings that are safe, healthy, nurturing, and responsive for each child. We are committed to supporting children’s development and learning; respecting individual differences; and helping children learn to 
live, play, and work cooperatively. 本課程旨在使學生了解跨領域團隊合作照護在醫療機構的運作概況。課程內容會介紹跨領域團隊照護的概念、各醫療專業職類的角色與功能、醫療人員如何提供以人為中心的照護。此外也會強化溝通協調、凝聚共識、團隊合作的概念，並以案例的方式引導學生進行討論。課程設計會透過講解、專家分享、情境模擬討論與案例討論等教學方法，培養 學生具備醫護教育的知識與技能、溝通協調、人文關懷及終身學習能力 。
This course a i m s to help students understand the concept s , mode ls of inter professional practice
( and i nterprofessional education ( in medical field . T he work areas and role functions of 14
disciplines of health professions in the medical system in Taiwan will be introduced t hrough multiple teaching methods of lectures , film watching , and discussion The s tudents will do role playing exercises and practice the patient centered inter disciplinary teamwork as the health professional s by using t hree real IPP case s , and reflect on relevant issues of IPP & IPE.

The foundation course aims to increase students’ understanding and interests in allied health education. The course contents are composed of introduction of concepts and theories of education, history of medical education, health professional development, clinical teaching, and artificial intelligence (AI) in allied health education. By using multiple teaching strategies of lecture, discussion, video appreciation, reflection, and readings, students will enhance their knowledge of allied health education, and improve their competencies of caring, critical thinking, communication, collaboration, and lifelong learning.

本課程計畫以業界常用之後製剪輯軟體為主要學習目標，讓同學在有系統的學習過程中，習得各項軟體功能與影像合成技巧，已具備數位影音剪輯與後製應有之專業知識與創作技巧。並經由專題設計與團隊合作，將所學應用於醫護數位影音教材之製作，提昇醫護數位影音教材之品質與成效。
This course focuses on learning effects and editing software. Allow students to acquire various This course focuses on learning effects and editing software. Allow students to acquire various software functions and post-imaging skills in a systematic learning process. Students will have the basic knowledge and creative skills of digital video editing and post-production. Through special topics and teamwork, the students will be applied to the production of digital teaching materials to improve the quality and effectiveness of digital teaching materials in the field of health care.

01
Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

Introduction of nursing Informatics
本課程旨在培養學生對健康資訊與護理資訊的基本概念，瞭解目前資通訊科技的知識及技術，於助產照護及婦女健康實務領域中的應用與發展現況，同時使學生能體認現今資訊科技發展在健康照護領域中扮演的角色與功能，及資訊系統導入後對醫療機構、助產照護專業、婦女健康專業及社會所造成的影響。
課程內容包括健康資訊與護理資訊的發展歷程、現況及未來發展趨勢、助產人員應具備資訊素養與能力、目前健康照護專業運用資訊科技的概念、資訊科技於助產照護實務、婦女健康教育、護理管理及婦女健康照護研究等各領域的應用現況與實例等。
This course aims to cultivate students the basic concepts of the health informatics and nursing informatics to understand the application of information and communications technology knowledge and skills in the field of midwifery care and women's health profession. Simultaneously, students can recognize the roles and functions of current information technology development in the field of health care, and the impact of the deployment of information systems on medical institutions, midwifery care profession, women's health profession, and society.
全18週

Breastfeeding and Clinical Application I
本課程設計旨在讓學生熟練支持母嬰成功母乳哺餵的技巧。內容闡述母乳哺育的重要性，母乳代用品銷售守則，進而探討奶水分泌的機轉及維持泌乳的方法，產前教育對哺乳的重要性、促進成功母乳哺育的11措施，並介紹生產及產後照護的醫療處置對母乳哺育的影響，認識哺乳期間常見乳房問題及寶寶可能發生狀況，運用溝通及諮詢技巧，結合評估及觀察解決各種母乳相關問題及出院返回社區後的持續支持。
This course is designed to provide students with skills needed to support mothers and their children to breastfeeding optimally. The contents include: the important of breastfeeding, mechanism of milk production, how to maintain milk production, prenatal breastfeeding education, the ten steps of successful breastfeeding, and the CODE. Students need to know the impact of intrapartum / postpartum practices to successful breastfeeding. Learning how to use history taking, assessment, communication and counselling skills to identify and solve the common breastfeeding problems related to mother and/or baby. And, how to provide the continuity support when they back to their community.
全18週

Chinese Medicine for Women and Infant Healthcare
本課程設計旨在讓學生增進孕產婦、新生兒及婦女健康照護能力、批判性思考能力、關懷能力、及跨文化照護能力。本系所培育的學生為助產及婦女健康照護專業人才，於培育學生具備孕產婦及婦女健康照護能力，及跨文化照護能力方面，內容包含中醫養生、藥食同源藥膳養生、孕期營養、產後坐月子餐、經絡穴位按摩與推拿於嬰兒及產前、產時及產後婦女保健。
This course is designed to enable undergraduate students to improve maternal, newborn and women's healthcare, critical thinking, caring, and cross-cultural care. According to the goal of this department that cultivates undergraduate students for midwifery and women's healthcare professionals relating to infant and prenatal and partum women's healthcare and cross-cultural care, the contents include Chinese medicine life cultivation, Chinese herbal medicine life cultivation, pregnancy nutrition, postpartum meals, meridian and acupoint application, Chinese tuina and massage.

Introduction of Biostatistics
本課程以教授大學部學生具有基本應用生物統計學分析的能力。強調生物統計學之應用與醫學及護理臨床研究結合，以奠定學生具有資料收集、資料分析及統計報表解讀之能力。課程內容包括：基本機率論、機率分佈理論、統計估計及檢定、變異數分析(ANOVA)、列聯表分析以及迴歸分析等。本課程將會使用EXCEL作為操作之統計軟體，必要時將會示範SAS或SPSS等專業統計軟體之操作。
The objective of this course is to provide students with the elementary knowledge and understanding of the methods of statistical analysis applicable to medical and nursing research.  Also, this course is directed to equip students with basic capability of applying statistical analysis.  The course is 'math-lite' emphasizing concepts and application of statistical thinking and application. Basic probability theory, parametric statistics, correlation, regression, ANOVA, non-parametric statistics along with computer package practice (SAS and SPSS) will be introduced.
全18週

Physiology and Pathology
本課程以學生在專科學校學得之基礎醫學知識為基礎，協助其更進一步瞭解人體生理學與病理學原理及機轉，包括：神經與肌肉生理學、神經系統、心臟血管系統、呼吸系統、腎臟與泌尿系統、消化系統、內分泌系統以及生殖系統。除了生理學與病理學的介紹之外，亦針對女性健康相關的議題進一步探討，例如：環境荷爾蒙對女性的影響、菸品對女性健康之危害、運動對健康之影響、更年期、懷孕期生理的適應、不當荷爾蒙使用導致女性相關疾病的風險、女性重要慢性疾病、懷孕與疾病相關性等。
The purpose of this course is to introduce the principles and the mechanisms of physiology and pathology. The contents include nerve and muscle physiology, nervous system, cardiovascular system, respiratory system, kidneys and urinary system, gastrointestinal system, endocrine system and reproductive system. Besides emphasizing the introduction of physiology and pathology, also discuss women’s health-related issues, e.g. impact of environmental hormones on women, harm of cigarette on women’s health, health benefits of exercise, menopause, physiological adaptation to pregnancy, risk of inappropriate hormones use, and women’s chronic diseases.
全18週

Midwifery and practice I
此課程為培育學生發展專業助產能力的第一階段課程，整體助產學課程架構旨在強調助產師的角色功能，課程內容包括以家庭為中心的取向，促進和維持低危妊娠婦女和其家庭成員的健康，及實施生產階段婦女、新生兒和家庭的健康管理。助產學及實作I的課程著重在助產師的角色功能介紹，正常懷孕期婦女、新生兒及其家庭的身心發展，並能評估其照護需求，提供符合其需求的照護。
These series midwifery courses are designed to prepare students for specialization in midwifery practice. The core concepts include: (1) women and family-centered approach to care; (2) promotion and maintenance of health for women and the family during low risk child bearing and the child rearing periods; (3) conducting health management for the women in labor and the family; and (4) promotion of health for childbearing stage women. Midwifery and practice I emphasizes on the role and function of midwives, the biopsychosocial adaptions and developmental tasks to pregnancy (including the pregnant women, neonate and the family). Knowing how to assess their needs and provide individualized as well as family-centered care.

Environmental Sustainability and Information Science
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
This course focuses on the importance of sustainable environmental development and information science. By integrating the application of information technology, this course aims to explain the importance of sustainable environmental development and to raise students' awareness of sustainable development in order to equip students with the ability to apply appropriate information technology and to develop the skills to maintain environmental sustainability.

The course covers topics such as environmental ethics, environmental change and disaster prevention, energy conservation and energy management, ecological conservation, computer programming, and information application integrated with environmental education themes. Teaching strategies include learning by doing, experiencing in real-life situations, cooperative learning methods, using sensory learning, exploring the environment, and integrating computer software applications.
全18週

Caring and communication
本課程旨在培養學生具備關懷與溝通的能力。課程內容包含了解關懷的內涵、引導學生從認識自己、關懷自我，延伸至關懷家人及關懷他人，並在人際互動中展現關懷與溝通的技巧與行為。
The aims of the course are to improve the self- awareness of the student, to nurture the competence of communication and caring. The course contents include the relationships among people to people, people to society, people to environment and spirit. The art of caring, caring and nursing, critical attributes of communication, communication model and related factors. The course emphasizes self-refection, student will be able to integrate the knowledge, attitude and skills of communication and caring, to aware self’s pattern of communication, to analyze the influences in daily life and nursing performance, willing to change, and demonstrate communication skill and caring in daily life.

01
Midwifery and practice III
此課程為培育學生發展助產專業能力的第三階段課程，整體助產學課程架構旨在強調助產師的角色功能，課程內容包括以家庭為中心的取向，促進和維持低危險妊娠婦女和其家庭成員的健康，及實施生產階段婦女、新生兒和家庭的健康管理。助產學及實作III的課程著重在助產師於高危險懷孕、生產及產後過程中的評估與照護，夫妻面臨不孕症的困境及其照護，常見婦女疾病及更年期的照護。
These series midwifery courses are designed to prepare students for specialization in midwifery practice. The core concepts include: (1) women and family-centered approach to care; (2) promotion and maintenance of health for women and the family during low risk child bearing and the child rearing periods; (3) conducting health management for the women in labor and the family; and (4) promotion of health for childbearing stage women. Midwifery and practice III emphasizes on midwifery care of antenatal, intrapartum and postpartum high-risk women. Assessing of infertility family needs and provide individualized, culturally-appropriated as well as family-centered care. Comment problems related to women health and menopause issues are also included.
第1~9週

Profession and ethics
旨在使學生獲得專業與倫理之基本知識、概念及各種婦女健康照護及助產倫理困境之分析與決策能力，進而激發學生發展批判性的倫理思考與判斷之潛能。課程內容以專業倫理之基本概念及倫理理論與原則之婦女健康照護及助產實務應用為主，包含價值觀與衝突、倫理與道德觀、病人權利與責任、助產師的權利與責任、倫理理論、基本倫理原則、倫理困境與倫理決策等之分析與討論。
The purposes of this course are to help students to gain the basic knowledge, concepts and standardized behavior of women health care and midwifery ethics, to distinguish clinical ethical issues, as well as the ability to analyze and make decisions of ethical dilemma in order to urge them to develop critical thinking and proper judgment. The concepts of this course focus on the ethical basic concepts and the application of ethical principles: including the analysis and discussion of ethics and moral concepts; the formation and conflicts of values, the rights and responsibilities of patients and midwives; the cooperational relationships of medical team; application the main theories and principles of ethics; nursing and midwifery code, ethical dilemma, and the ethical decision framework.
第1~9週

Evidence-based practice in healthcare
本課程目標在協助學生獲得實證健康照護相關的知識與技能。課程以執行實證五步驟為架構，內容包含:介紹實證健康照護概念、提出實證可以回答的臨床問題(PICO)、文獻資料庫與搜尋最佳證據、評析文獻與實證護理應用。實作方面包含:運用學習小組練習以PICO詢問臨床問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級、提出臨床決策建議及閱讀系統性文獻回顧文章。
This course aims to introduce evidence-based practice in Healthcare and strengthen knowledge and skills of evidence-based nursing for nursing students. Course contents include foundational concepts of evidence-based practice, concepts of systematic review and clinical guideline, PICO, searching for the current best evidence, methodology appraisal, and analyzing data. Students will have the opportunity to practice skills of using PICO to ask answerable clinical questions, searching the evidence and assessing quality of a randomized controlled trial, levels of evidence, and reading articles of systematic review.
第1~9週

01
Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

本課程為一學期每週兩小時的閱讀。教學重點為文法重點復習、閱讀技巧及練習普通英文閱讀。於該課程中學生能熟練高初級至初中級（high beginning ~low-intermediate level）基本文法重點，學習並運用各種英文閱讀技巧，閱讀並理解高初級至初中級（high beginning~low-intermediate level）普通英文文章。
This course includes a two-hour reading instruction each week.  Students are placed at different levels according to their individual English performance displayed in a placement test administered beforehand.  The main contents of the course are grammar review, reading skills and practice, basic level general English.
全18週

Incident Management and First Aid
本課程旨在培養學生獲得緊急處置之知能及公共安全問題之認知。課程內容主要包括：緊急救護法規及政策、緊急救護系統、災難處置、逃生知識及傷病患疏散、救護等緊急處置。使其在發生緊急事故或災害之際，能冷靜、評估且迅速的做適當處理，使生命的傷害及財產損失降至最低。
The emphasis in this course is on the enhancement of the knowledge base and skill for 
public security. The content includes legal aspects of hospital      disaster management, 
emergency care systems, prevention and management of common incidents seen in 
hospital and related facilities, and ways of escape from dangerous scenes. In addition, the 
practice of bandage and mobilization is provided. The student is expected to be able in 
managing unexpected incidents critically and minimizing loss of health, lives, and 
properties.
全18週

Stress and Emotion Management
本課程主旨在協助學生了解個體壓力與情緒管理之相關理論，經由教學活動的參與，洞察自己壓力及情緒來源、壓力與情緒反應的模式、以及本身健康、工作、人際關係、日常生活受情緒影響之部份，並從中學習良好的壓力與情緒控制管理方法。使學生能在任何情境下，藉由合宜的表達得以發揮潛能、愉快的工作並提昇生活滿意度。教學方法包括:講解、課室活動、經驗分享、角色扮演、實例演練及作業習作。
This course provides students with advanced knowledge and skills about individual sentiment and emotion management. Through the participation of the teaching activities, the students can understand thoroughly the origin of their emotion, the model of the emotional response and how their health, work, human relation and day-to-day life are affected by the emotion. Moreover, the students can learn the skills of emotion control and management so that their emotional expression can have a good fit and enjoy their work.
全18週

01
Gerontological Nursing
本課程在增進學生對一般老人照護的認知，培養學生具備以多元化觀點評估照護一般老人的實務能力，課程內容包括：老人護理概論，與老人的溝通、文化及倫理議題，老人身體、心理、社會及靈性的評估與護理，老人常見健康問題與護理，老人居家照護與社區照護之網絡與資源等，教學活動包括：講習、討論、問答、影片欣賞、分組報告等。
This course is designed to improve the knowledge and skills of the students on the elderly health care, to multiple-culture the clinical competency of the students, which was based on the diverse perspectives. The course contents include the theory of aging; the assessment and nursing care of physiological, psychosocial, and spirit aspects of elders; the response of loss, dying; the conceptual framework of Gerontological nursing; community network and resources for nursing care of elders; and the presence and future of Gerontological nursing. Teaching activities include lecture, discussing, questioning, watching movie, visiting, and report.
全18週

Cancer Care
本課程目標在協助學生獲得有關成人癌症的知識與技能，能評估癌症個案身、心、社會的需要與問題，並能識別個案家庭因癌症所造成之影響；綜合運用護理過程、教與學原理等相關知識與技能，協助癌症個案滿足身、心、社會的需要與家庭健康的照顧。課程內容包括：癌症的疾病基本概念，癌症的治療與其副作用護理，癌症病人常見的症狀評估與護理，如：感染、凝血障礙、營養、噁心嘔吐、疼痛、呼吸困難等。腫瘤急症護理及末期病人之安寧照護亦為本課程教授之重點。
This course aims to provide  advanced knowledge  about care for the adult oncology patients and 
their family and  to strengthen concepts of continuity care and  the importance of multidisciplinary  in cancer care. The concept of holistic nursing care and the trajectory of cancer experience will be utilized 
as frameworks to introduce nursing care for oncology patients. Course contents include general concepts of cancer, cancer treatment modalities, symptom control, psycho-social needs of cancer patients, family impact in cancer care. Symptoms that are commonly seen in adult oncology patients will be emphasized.
全18週

Seminar on patient safety practice
本課程的特色是增進學生對病人安全基本概念的知識，瞭解自己應具備病人安全的照護能力，並透過設計臨床實際病人安全的案例，讓學生能運用所學知識，對於病人安全照護有整體性概念，並培養學生對於病人安全議題有正向態度，及學習分享病人安全照護經驗的意願，進而建立其終身學習病人安全新知的習慣與能力。
This course is to enhance students' basic knowledge of the patient safety concept and to understand what competencies of patient safety they should have. Through the design of clinical patient safety issuescase study, students will be able to utilize the knowledge of patient safety to provide holistic care. This course also fosters students to have a positive attitude towards on patient safety issues, learn to share the experience of patient safety issues, and build lifelong learning habits and competence for new knowledge of patient safety.

01
Introduction of Case Management in Long-Term Care
本課程主在介紹長期照護個案管理的基本知能，包括：個案管理/照護管理名詞、緣起與發展、個案管理在長期照護常見應用領域與樣態、個管實務操作流程與原則、個案管理人員的角色功能、個管服務成效以及國外個管發展的應用經驗等議題。學習者在引導下，同時透過長期照護不同服務情境與案例，運用反思進行討論，同時也發揮關懷態度及團隊合作能力完成課程指定學習活動，使學生能夠在既有專業基礎上增加長期照護個案管理相關知能。
The purpose of this course is to help students to gain the basic knowledge and skill that related to the case management in Long Term Care. It include the concept, models, process and the application and practice of case management in long term care.Under the guidance, learners through multi-teaching strategies and learning methods (for example: through reflection, group discussion and sharing, self-learning activities, etc.) to acquire the knowledge of case management. Learners take the initiative to show concern and work as a team to complete the classroom assignments to achieve learners' awareness of case management in long-term care services. After complete the course, the students will be able: (1) to understand the knowledge of case management; (2) to apply the case management values and principles in long term care practices; (3) to identify the role/competency, and the function of a case manager in long term care. It can be applied to the field of long-term care practice role, execution and management in the existing professional foundation.
全18週

Introduction of Biostatistics
授與提昇研究能力與增進閱讀學術文獻有關統計能力之知識與概念。其內容包括敘述統計學（集中趨勢量數、離中趨勢量數、分布、作圖與作表）以及推論統計學（區間估計與考驗之過程，Z score、pooled-t test、paired-t test、卡方、one-way ANOVA、皮爾遜積差相關、線性迴歸與無母數分析等）。課中利用EXCEL資料分析工具及各式小型科學電算器如Casio 36PV等協助運算，期能達成理論與實務之結合為目的。
The focus of this course is applied statistical techniques, with emphasis on data management, and data analysis through the Statistical Package for the Social Sciences. This course will complete weekly computer assignments that provide "hands on" experience with data analysis and interpretation of results. Students will actually understand statistical procedures and apply statistical techniques to concrete data.

本課程設計旨在協助學生培養服務的精神，藉由至服務機構提供服務，落實課堂所學之服務知識與理念，並進而從服務中學習、瞭解服務於社區之重要性與體驗服務之意義，培養正向的服務態度，以期自我省思、瞭解自我進而促進自我成長與肯定生命價值。
This course is provided to introduce the basic concepts of volunteer, and help the students with fundamental understanding in non-profit organization (NPO). The class will be guided by different instructions of lecture, group discussion, homework and test. By the end, the students will have basic understanding on concepts, principle, and management model in volunteer works and NPO. These will be helpful students for their future jobs and their quality of life.
全18週

本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。

knowledge and skills of research methodology. This course provides students step by step guidance 
of the research process as well as the critique of in-progress and completed research.

Teaching Principles: The Application in Health Care Practice
本課程旨在培養學生基本的教學能力，使學生能運用教學的原理進行個人、家庭及社區等照顧對象健康指導之教學過程。同時讓學生體認教學在健康照護實務中的功能，並培養學生對教學的興趣與應有的態度。學生修習本課程中必需實際完成教學計畫的擬定、執行、與評值過程。課程內容包括教學在護理專業中之角色功能、教與學原則、教學設計、學習評估、擬定教學計畫、各種教學方法、教學媒體與資源、教學評值、及臨床護理教學等。
This course will assist students to develop basic competencies in health teaching for individuals,families,and communities. The interdisciplinary nature of health teaching, theories of teaching and learning, and their applications in client education, clinical teaching of students and staff development will be thoroughly discussed. Actual student teaching project will be developed, implemented, and evaluated.

Advanced Chinese Literature

The main purpose of this course is to increase students’ capabilities of appreciating literary works and expressing verbally.  Through studies of representative works of classic and modern Chinese literature, students are given the opportunity to appreciate the abundant and luxuriant styles of Chinese literature.  The instructor will guide students, by teaching methods as lecturing, discussion, and self-learning, to explore the profundity and the vitality of Chinese literature and furthermore, to understand the truth, virtue, and beauty of Chinese culture.

01
Microbiology and Immunology
醫用微生物與免疫學隸屬基礎醫學門，為醫學與護理之專業核心科目之一。近二十多年來,因分子生物學之蓬勃發展，使得微生物學與免疫學之內容日趨複雜。唯有以分子生物學為基礎來解說本課程,才能脫離以往只能說明表相之教學窠臼。
本課程之設計配合前述趨勢，內容傾向臨床應用,並使學生易於瞭解。先由宿主與寄生者間競爭優勢之生態看感染性疾病之發生，免疫反應在此過程中決定了疾病之形成與否,由此介紹人體免疫的基本構成成員與免疫反應的種類與運作。再以人體之器官系統為主軸，分別介紹各種傳染性疾病及其病原體。由分子生物學之觀點探討疾病機制及現象，以預防醫學之角度看傳染性疾病之發生與控制。
傳染性疾病由微生物造成，生態環境與生活方式之改變，使得傳染性疾病之面貌與半世紀前大不相同。傳染性疾病之控制，包括預防與醫療成為重要課題，微生物學著重此方向之探討。
人體除藉由免疫系統防禦感染並負起消除不正常細胞之重責，因而健全之生理得以維持。萬一免疫系統之運作失調，除了無法對付感染之外，還可能反而造成對自身之傷害，現已知許多疾病即肇因於此。因此免疫學同列為本課程教學內容。
The knowledge in the field of both medical microbiology and Immunology are accumulated amazingly.Taking into account the changes that are currently taking place in the teaching of medical microbiology in medical schools world wide, the content of this course is geared towards making the subject more accessible and relevant to clinical practice.
 At the beginning of this course, we introduce infectious disease in terms of the conflict between the host and the parasite. Immunology plays a central role in this conflict, as a given microbe can infect and cause disease only if it can survive under the multitude of immune response of the host. From the point of view, current basic concepts of immunology and the pathogenesis of immune disorder are introduced at the second section of this course. In the third section, clinically based accounts of infectious diseases are classified according to the particular organ system involved. We also place particular emphasis on pathogenesis, clinical symptom, control and prevention as well as possible molecular mechanisms of the diseases. Moreover, we discuss the infectious diseases that burst out locally or somewhere in the world at present.
全18週

Introduction of Biostatistics
授與提昇研究能力與增進閱讀學術文獻有關統計能力之知識與概念。其內容包括敘述統計學（集中趨勢量數、離中趨勢量數、分布、作圖與作表）以及推論統計學（區間估計與考驗之過程，Z score、pooled-t test、paired-t test、卡方、one-way ANOVA、皮爾遜積差相關、線性迴歸與無母數分析等）。課中利用EXCEL資料分析工具及各式小型科學電算器如Casio 36PV等協助運算，期能達成理論與實務之結合為目的。
The focus of this course is applied statistical techniques, with emphasis on data management, and data analysis through the Statistical Package for the Social Sciences. This course will complete weekly computer assignments that provide "hands on" experience with data analysis and interpretation of results. Students will actually understand statistical procedures and apply statistical techniques to concrete data.
全18週

本課程之設計配合前述趨勢，內容傾向臨床應用,並使學生易於瞭解。先由宿主與寄生者間競爭優勢之生態看感染性疾病之發生，免疫反應在此過程中決定了疾病之形成與否,由此介紹人體免疫的基本構成成員與免疫反應的種類與運作。再以人體之器官系統為主軸，分別介紹各種傳染性疾病及其病原體。由分子生物學之觀點探討疾病機制及現象，以預防醫學之角度看傳染性疾病之發生與控制。
傳染性疾病由微生物造成，生態環境與生活方式之改變，使得傳染性疾病之面貌與半世紀前大不相同。傳染性疾病之控制，包括預防與醫療成為重要課題，微生物學著重此方向之探討。
人體除藉由免疫系統防禦感染並負起消除不正常細胞之重責，因而健全之生理得以維持。萬一免疫系統之運作失調，除了無法對付感染之外，還可能反而造成對自身之傷害，現已知許多疾病即肇因於此。因此免疫學同列為本課程教學內容。
The knowledge in the field of both medical microbiology and Immunology are accumulated amazingly.Taking into account the changes that are currently taking place in the teaching of medical microbiology in medical schools world wide, the content of this course is geared towards making the subject more accessible and relevant to clinical practice.
 At the beginning of this course, we introduce infectious disease in terms of the conflict between the host and the parasite. Immunology plays a central role in this conflict, as a given microbe can infect and cause disease only if it can survive under the multitude of immune response of the host. From the point of view, current basic concepts of immunology and the pathogenesis of immune disorder are introduced at the second section of this course. In the third section, clinically based accounts of infectious diseases are classified according to the particular organ system involved. We also place particular emphasis on pathogenesis, clinical symptom, control and prevention as well as possible molecular mechanisms of the diseases. Moreover, we discuss the infectious diseases that burst out locally or somewhere in the world at present.
全18週

Introduction of Biostatistics
授與提昇研究能力與增進閱讀學術文獻有關統計能力之知識與概念。其內容包括敘述統計學（集中趨勢量數、離中趨勢量數、分布、作圖與作表）以及推論統計學（區間估計與考驗之過程，Z score、pooled-t test、paired-t test、卡方、one-way ANOVA、皮爾遜積差相關、線性迴歸與無母數分析等）。課中利用EXCEL資料分析工具及各式小型科學電算器如Casio 36PV等協助運算，期能達成理論與實務之結合為目的。
The focus of this course is applied statistical techniques, with emphasis on data management, and data analysis through the Statistical Package for the Social Sciences. This course will complete weekly computer assignments that provide "hands on" experience with data analysis and interpretation of results. Students will actually understand statistical procedures and apply statistical techniques to concrete data.
全18週

Physiology

Introduction to Nursing Research
本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
This course is an introductory course on nursing research.  Students will have the opportunity 
for a systematic investigation of a health-related topic of the student’s interest demonstrating 
knowledge and skills of research methodology. This course provides students step by step guidance 
of the research process as well as the critique of in-progress and completed research.

Teaching Principles: The Application in Health Care Practice
本課程旨在培養學生基本的教學能力，使學生能運用教學的原理進行個人、家庭及社區等照顧對象健康指導之教學過程。同時讓學生體認教學在健康照護實務中的功能，並培養學生對教學的興趣與應有的態度。學生修習本課程中必需實際完成教學計畫的擬定、執行、與評值過程。課程內容包括教學在護理專業中之角色功能、教與學原則、教學設計、學習評估、擬定教學計畫、各種教學方法、教學媒體與資源、教學評值、及臨床護理教學等。
This course will assist students to develop basic competencies in health teaching for individuals,families,and communities. The interdisciplinary nature of health teaching, theories of teaching and learning, and their applications in client education, clinical teaching of students and staff development will be thoroughly discussed. Actual student teaching project will be developed, implemented, and evaluated.

Advanced Chinese Literature

The main purpose of this course is to increase students’ capabilities of appreciating literary works and expressing verbally. The instructor will guide students, by teaching methods as lecturing, discussion, and self-learning, to explore the profundity and the vitality of Chinese literature and furthermore, to understand the truth, virtue, and beauty of Chinese culture.

Teaching Principles: The Application in Health Care Practice

Actual student teaching project will be developed, implemented, and evaluated.

01
Microbiology and Immunology
醫用微生物與免疫學隸屬基礎醫學門，為醫學與護理之專業核心科目之一。近二十多年來,因分子生物學之蓬勃發展，使得微生物學與免疫學之內容日趨複雜。唯有以分子生物學為基礎來解說本課程,才能脫離以往只能說明表相之教學窠臼。
本課程之設計配合前述趨勢，內容傾向臨床應用,並使學生易於瞭解。先由宿主與寄生者間競爭優勢之生態看感染性疾病之發生，免疫反應在此過程中決定了疾病之形成與否,由此介紹人體免疫的基本構成成員與免疫反應的種類與運作。再以人體之器官系統為主軸，分別介紹各種傳染性疾病及其病原體。由分子生物學之觀點探討疾病機制及現象，以預防醫學之角度看傳染性疾病之發生與控制。
傳染性疾病由微生物造成，生態環境與生活方式之改變，使得傳染性疾病之面貌與半世紀前大不相同。傳染性疾病之控制，包括預防與醫療成為重要課題，微生物學著重此方向之探討。
人體除藉由免疫系統防禦感染並負起消除不正常細胞之重責，因而健全之生理得以維持。萬一免疫系統之運作失調，除了無法對付感染之外，還可能反而造成對自身之傷害，現已知許多疾病即肇因於此。因此免疫學同列為本課程教學內容。
The knowledge in the field of both medical microbiology and Immunology are accumulated amazingly.Taking into account the changes that are currently taking place in the teaching of medical microbiology in medical schools world wide, the content of this course is geared towards making the subject more accessible and relevant to clinical practice.
 At the beginning of this course, we introduce infectious disease in terms of the conflict between the host and the parasite. Immunology plays a central role in this conflict, as a given microbe can infect and cause disease only if it can survive under the multitude of immune response of the host. From the point of view, current basic concepts of immunology and the pathogenesis of immune disorder are introduced at the second section of this course. In the third section, clinically based accounts of infectious diseases are classified according to the particular organ system involved. We also place particular emphasis on pathogenesis, clinical symptom, control and prevention as well as possible molecular mechanisms of the diseases. Moreover, we discuss the infectious diseases that burst out locally or somewhere in the world at present.
全18週

本課程旨在培養學生基本的教學能力，使學生能運用教學的原理進行個人、家庭及社區等照顧對象健康指導之教學過程。同時讓學生體認教學在健康照護實務中的功能，並培養學生對教學的興趣與應有的態度。學生修習本課程中必需實際完成教學計畫的擬定、執行、與評值過程。課程內容包括教學在護理專業中之角色功能、教與學原則、教學設計、學習評估、擬定教學計畫、各種教學方法、教學媒體與資源、教學評值、及臨床護理教學等。
This course will assist students to develop basic competencies in health teaching for individuals,families,and communities. The interdisciplinary nature of health teaching, theories of teaching and learning, and their applications in client education, clinical teaching of students and staff development will be thoroughly discussed. Actual student teaching project will be developed, implemented, and evaluated.
全18週

01
Advanced Chinese Literature
本課程藉由古典文學（散文、詩詞歌賦、傳奇、戲劇）、中國哲學、現代文學（新詩、散文、小說）及兒童文學之專題選讀，指導學生研讀文學典籍及賞析的方法，使學生能掌握先賢之生命智慧與藝術心靈，了解中國學術源流及古今文學的精義，從而體認傳統文化的歷史傳承之責任。
The main purpose of this course is to increase students’ capabilities of appreciating literary works and expressing verbally.  Through studies of representative works of classic and modern Chinese literature, students are given the opportunity to appreciate the abundant and luxuriant styles of Chinese literature.  The instructor will guide students, by teaching methods as lecturing, discussion, and self-learning, to explore the profundity and the vitality of Chinese literature and furthermore, to understand the truth, virtue, and beauty of Chinese culture.

01
Microbiology and Immunology
醫用微生物與免疫學隸屬基礎醫學門，為醫學與護理之專業核心科目之一。近二十多年來,因分子生物學之蓬勃發展，使得微生物學與免疫學之內容日趨複雜。唯有以分子生物學為基礎來解說本課程,才能脫離以往只能說明表相之教學窠臼。
本課程之設計配合前述趨勢，內容傾向臨床應用,並使學生易於瞭解。先由宿主與寄生者間競爭優勢之生態看感染性疾病之發生，免疫反應在此過程中決定了疾病之形成與否,由此介紹人體免疫的基本構成成員與免疫反應的種類與運作。再以人體之器官系統為主軸，分別介紹各種傳染性疾病及其病原體。由分子生物學之觀點探討疾病機制及現象，以預防醫學之角度看傳染性疾病之發生與控制。
傳染性疾病由微生物造成，生態環境與生活方式之改變，使得傳染性疾病之面貌與半世紀前大不相同。傳染性疾病之控制，包括預防與醫療成為重要課題，微生物學著重此方向之探討。
人體除藉由免疫系統防禦感染並負起消除不正常細胞之重責，因而健全之生理得以維持。萬一免疫系統之運作失調，除了無法對付感染之外，還可能反而造成對自身之傷害，現已知許多疾病即肇因於此。因此免疫學同列為本課程教學內容。
The knowledge in the field of both medical microbiology and Immunology are accumulated amazingly.Taking into account the changes that are currently taking place in the teaching of medical microbiology in medical schools world wide, the content of this course is geared towards making the subject more accessible and relevant to clinical practice.
 At the beginning of this course, we introduce infectious disease in terms of the conflict between the host and the parasite. Immunology plays a central role in this conflict, as a given microbe can infect and cause disease only if it can survive under the multitude of immune response of the host. From the point of view, current basic concepts of immunology and the pathogenesis of immune disorder are introduced at the second section of this course. In the third section, clinically based accounts of infectious diseases are classified according to the particular organ system involved. We also place particular emphasis on pathogenesis, clinical symptom, control and prevention as well as possible molecular mechanisms of the diseases. Moreover, we discuss the infectious diseases that burst out locally or somewhere in the world at present.
全18週

The Introduction of Traditional Chinese Medicine
本課程旨在介紹中醫學基本理論及辨證論治，內容包含陰陽學說、五行學說、臟象學說、經絡學說、氣血及津液學說、中醫疾病機轉、四診八綱、辨證、治則治法。此課程可提升健康照護人才具備中醫照護專業能力。
This course attempts to introduce the fundamental theories and concepts of traditional Chinese medicine, and syndrome differentiation and treatment. The major course contents include principles of yin and yang, five phases theory, five zang-organs, six fu-organs, meridians and acupoint theory, qi, blood, and fluids theory, pathogenesis of traditional Chinese medicine, eight principal syndromes for diagnosis, organ pattern identification, principle and method of treatment. This can promote students’ professional skills for traditional Chinese medicine nursing

01
Elderly Long Term Care Integrated Care Practice
本課程在增進學生對生活獨立及依賴之長者照護的知能，培養學生具備以多元化觀點評估照護個案的實務能力，期望學生能運用老人護理學及長期照護學課程內容，包括：老人及長照護理概論，運用身體、心理、社會及靈性的評估與護理模式，發現個案常見之重要健康問題，並給予安全、具個別性護理方案，同時運用社區照護之網絡與資源等於臨床實務，學生可以認知老人及長期照護體系中護理專業角色功能，與分享自我感受及角色調適。
This course is to enhance students' knowledge of independent and dependent elderly care, and cultivate students to have the practical ability to evaluate care cases from a diversified perspective. It is expected that students can use the content of elderly nursing and long-term care courses, including: elderly and long-term care introduction to nursing, using physical, psychological, social, and spiritual assessment and nursing models to find common important health problems in cases, and provide safe and individualized nursing plans. At the same time, using the network and resources of community care is equivalent to clinical practice, and students can recognize the role of nursing professionals in the elderly and long-term care system, sharing self-experience and role adjustment.

Introduction of Animal Assisted Therapy
本課程希望藉由課堂講授、討論、影片研討等方式，輔以實作體驗學習之活動設計，將生命教育內涵融入醫護及教育實務中，課程內容包括動物輔助治療的施行模式、動物輔助治療在健康照護、教育輔導與行為矯治等層面之應用，以及動物用於提升人類生活品質之相關議題探討等。透過帶領學生認識動物在人類健康照護與教育輔導領域的重要性，以培養學生尊重生命及參與推廣促進人與動物關係方案的知能，並落實在人類身、心、靈、社會與環境的多面向照護上。
This course is to introduce the applications of animal assisted therapy into human health care and education, based on “human-animal interaction.” The course topics include: the trends of animal welfare issues; animals and human health; the research, practice, and models of animal assisted therapy, etc. The teaching activities include lectures, group discussions, professional visits, documentary films discussion, etc. Students are expected to be initiated their knowledge and interests in both animal welfare and animal assisted therapy issues.

This course content includes Wearable Technology, Connected Health, Physiological Health Monitoring Technology, Health Big Data, Integrated Wearable Device Platform, Care Robot, Drug Monitoring, Health Care APP, Virtual Reality, and project-based learning.

本課程在透過臨床實習觀察，協助學生運用癌症照護相關的知識與技能，評估癌症各案的身、心、社會需要與問題，並能識別個案家庭因癌症所造成之影響；且運用護理過程的概念、提供癌症個案所需的相關照護活動。
This course aims to provide advanced knowledge about care for the adult oncology patients and their family and to strengthen concepts of continuity care and the importance of multidisciplinary in cancer care. Symptoms that are commonly seen in adult oncology patients will be emphasized.

Innovation Design in Elderly Health Service
本課程旨在提供學生瞭解高齡健康照護服務發展及需求，並發掘實際場域問題，進而利用創新設計思維學習以問題解決策略提供可能的解決方案。本課程教學架構擬導入「設計思考五步驟」，培養學生高齡者同理、高齡健康照護場域問題定義、智慧照護解決方案構思、及貼心創新設計產品或服務流程原型架設等能力，藉由課堂互動、工作坊參與、實作演練與討論，啟發學生應用創新思維定義高齡健康照護服務問題並提出初步的可能策略或方案。期望學生修習本課程後能具備創新思考之基本觀念與實作應用技能，並能夠運用在高齡健康照護服務創新設計之發展。
The purpose of this course is to help students to gain innovation design knowledge and skill that related to elderly health care service and solved the real problems in care settings. The teaching framework of this course intends to introduce the "Five Steps of Design Thinking", and to cultivate students' abilities in empathy for senior citizens, problem definitions in the elderly health care field, smart care solution conception, and thoughtful and innovative design of product or service process prototypes, etc. This course inspired by classroom interaction, workshop participation, practical exercises and discussions. Students apply innovative thinking to define the problems of elderly health care services and propose preliminary possible strategies or plans. This impacted students’ interesting of innovation and design thinking and can be useful in elderly health care service. After complete the course, the students will be able: (1) to understand the knowledge of innovation and design; (2) to apply the innovation and design values and principles in elderly health care service practices.

Basic Japanese

After this course, students will be able to use practical Japanese and read the instructions from Japanese medicine.

01
The Esthetics of Images
本課程為集合影像的發展史與美學方向的討論。帶領學生具有批判性與哲學性思考剖析攝影與繪畫的關聯，電影與影像在觀看、被觀看兩者之間的關係。影像發展史除了側重歐洲、美國的發展外，也關注東亞尤其日本的寫真歷史、台灣的解嚴後的攝影運動發展，以及當代網際網路興起後的手機攝影與錄像發展。
This course includes discussions on various topics, such as photography, videos, mo-tion pictures and visual aesthetics, through critical and philosophical lens while seek-ing to understand the relations between painting ,video, film and photography from the points of viewers and producers. The course not only focuses on the history of visual arts development in Europe and the U.S.A, but also looks into visual arts de-velopments in other East Asian countries, such as Japan and Taiwan after WWII. Dur-ing the course, we will also discuss the development of videos and pictures captured by mobile phones in modern days.
全18週

01
Profession and Ethics
本課程旨在使學生獲得專業與倫理之基本知識、概念及各種護理倫理困境之分析與決策能力，進而激發學生發展批判性的倫理思考與判斷之潛能。課程內容以專業倫理之基本概念及倫理理論與原則之護理實務應用為主，透過講解、分析與問題導向學習等教學方法，檢視價值觀與衝突、倫理與道德觀、病人權利與責任、護理師權利與責任、倫理理論、基本倫理原則、倫理困境與倫理決策等等議題。
The purposes of this course are to help students to gain the basic knowledge, concepts and standardized behavior of nursing ethics, to distinguish clinical ethical issues, as well as the ability to analyze and make decisions of ethical dilemma in order to urge them to develop critical thinking and proper judgment. The concepts of this course focus on the ethical basic concepts and the application of ethical principles: including the analysis and discussion of ethics and moral concepts; the formation and conflicts of values, the rights and responsibilities of patients and nurses; the cooperational relationships of medical team; application the main theories and principles of ethics; nursing code, ethical dilemma, and the ethical decision framework.
全18週

01
Evidence-Based Practice in Healthcare
本課程目標在協助學生獲得實證護理相關的知識與技能。課程以執行實證五步驟為架構，內容包含:介紹實證護理概念、提出實證可以回答的臨床問題(PICO)、文獻資料庫與搜尋最佳證據、評析文獻與實證護理應用。實作方面包含:運用學習小組練習以 PICO 詢問臨床問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級、提出臨床決策建議及閱讀系統性文獻回顧文章。
This course aims to introduceevidence-based nursing and strengthen knowledge and skills of evidence-based nursing for nursing students. Course contents includefundationalconcepts of evidence-based nursing, concepts of systematic review and clinical guideline, PICO, searching for the current best evidence, methodologyappraisal, and analyzing data. Students will have the opportunity to practice skills of using PICO to ask answerable clinical questions, searching the evidence and assessing quality of a randomized controlled trial, levels of evidence, and reading articles of systema tric review .
全18週

01
Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

Medical Organization and Management
本課程旨在透過講述、e 化、翻轉、自主和案例省思等教學與學習方法，協助學生獲得護理行政管理之知識、態度與技能。課程內容以護理管理過程為架構，主要包括：規劃、組織、人力資源管理、領導及控制等，以期啟發學生對自我管理及護理行政管理之認識與興趣，並能實際運用於臨床業務。
This course is designed for students to acquire the knowledge and skills of nursing administration, and it contents nursing management process, planning, organization, human resource management, leadership, control, and so on. Each student is encouraged to initiate her or his knowledge and interest in nursing administrative field and to utilize the course knowledge and skills in nursing career in the future.
全18週

01
Introduction for Nursing Employment
本課程旨在協助學生未來能順利的適應職涯的環境，透過討論、講授、參與職涯講座、資料搜尋、自學及分組報告等方式，認識台灣各層級醫院、優質護理職場之條件、職場相關議題和護理新鮮人可能面臨的問題，進而協助學生能有適當的選擇就業職場
The purpose of the course is to guide and prepare students for the practicum of obtaining nursing employment. Through lecturing and discussion, students will be familiar with the purposes and agendas of the practicum, and knowing how to prepare themselves in advance to facilitate their learning during the practicum. Through the preparation of the course, students are expected to be able to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in nursing practice. In together with the practicum for obtaining nursing employment, this course is aimed to develop students’ clinical competence in providing evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care.
全18週

01
Profession and Ethics
本課程旨在使學生獲得專業與倫理之基本知識、概念及各種護理倫理困境之分析與決策能力，進而激發學生發展批判性的倫理思考與判斷之潛能。課程內容以專業倫理之基本概念及倫理理論與原則之護理實務應用為主，透過講解、分析與問題導向學習等教學方法，檢視價值觀與衝突、倫理與道德觀、病人權利與責任、護理師權利與責任、倫理理論、基本倫理原則、倫理困境與倫理決策等等議題。
The purposes of this course are to help students to gain the basic knowledge, concepts and standardized behavior of nursing ethics, to distinguish clinical ethical issues, as well as the ability to analyze and make decisions of ethical dilemma in order to urge them to develop critical thinking and proper judgment. The concepts of this course focus on the ethical basic concepts and the application of ethical principles: including the analysis and discussion of ethics and moral concepts; the formation and conflicts of values, the rights and responsibilities of patients and nurses; the cooperational relationships of medical team; application the main theories and principles of ethics; nursing code, ethical dilemma, and the ethical decision framework.
全18週

01
Evidence-Based Practice in Healthcare
本課程目標在協助學生獲得實證護理相關的知識與技能。課程以執行實證五步驟為架構，內容包含:介紹實證護理概念、提出實證可以回答的臨床問題(PICO)、文獻資料庫與搜尋最佳證據、評析文獻與實證護理應用。實作方面包含:運用學習小組練習以 PICO 詢問臨床問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級、提出臨床決策建議及閱讀系統性文獻回顧文章。
This course aims to introduceevidence-based nursing and strengthen knowledge and skills of evidence-based nursing for nursing students. Course contents includefundationalconcepts of evidence-based nursing, concepts of systematic review and clinical guideline, PICO, searching for the current best evidence, methodologyappraisal, and analyzing data. Students will have the opportunity to practice skills of using PICO to ask answerable clinical questions, searching the evidence and assessing quality of a randomized controlled trial, levels of evidence, and reading articles of systema tric review .
全18週

01
Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

Medical Organization and Management
本課程旨在透過講述、e 化、翻轉、自主和案例省思等教學與學習方法，協助學生獲得護理行政管理之知識、態度與技能。課程內容以護理管理過程為架構，主要包括：規劃、組織、人力資源管理、領導及控制等，以期啟發學生對自我管理及護理行政管理之認識與興趣，並能實際運用於臨床業務。
This course is designed for students to acquire the knowledge and skills of nursing administration, and it contents nursing management process, planning, organization, human resource management, leadership, control, and so on. Each student is encouraged to initiate her or his knowledge and interest in nursing administrative field and to utilize the course knowledge and skills in nursing career in the future.
全18週

01
Introduction for Nursing Employment
本課程旨在協助學生未來能順利的適應職涯的環境，透過討論、講授、參與職涯講座、資料搜尋、自學及分組報告等方式，認識台灣各層級醫院、優質護理職場之條件、職場相關議題和護理新鮮人可能面臨的問題，進而協助學生能有適當的選擇就業職場
The purpose of the course is to guide and prepare students for the practicum of obtaining nursing employment. Through lecturing and discussion, students will be familiar with the purposes and agendas of the practicum, and knowing how to prepare themselves in advance to facilitate their learning during the practicum. Through the preparation of the course, students are expected to be able to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in nursing practice. In together with the practicum for obtaining nursing employment, this course is aimed to develop students’ clinical competence in providing evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care.
全18週

Evidence-Based Practice in Healthcare
本課程目標在協助學生獲得實證護理相關的知識與技能。課程以執行實證五步驟為架構，內容包含:介紹實證護理概念、提出實證可以回答的臨床問題(PICO)、文獻資料庫與搜尋最佳證據、評析文獻與實證護理應用。實作方面包含:運用學習小組練習以 PICO 詢問臨床問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級、提出臨床決策建議及閱讀系統性文獻回顧文章。
This course aims to introduceevidence-based nursing and strengthen knowledge and skills of evidence-based nursing for nursing students. Course contents includefundationalconcepts of evidence-based nursing, concepts of systematic review and clinical guideline, PICO, searching for the current best evidence, methodologyappraisal, and analyzing data. Students will have the opportunity to practice skills of using PICO to ask answerable clinical questions, searching the evidence and assessing quality of a randomized controlled trial, levels of evidence, and reading articles of systema tric review .
全18週

01
Introduction of Professional Law
本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .
全18週

Medical Organization and Management
本課程旨在透過講述、e 化、翻轉、自主和案例省思等教學與學習方法，協助學生獲得護理行政管理之知識、態度與技能。課程內容以護理管理過程為架構，主要包括：規劃、組織、人力資源管理、領導及控制等，以期啟發學生對自我管理及護理行政管理之認識與興趣，並能實際運用於臨床業務。
This course is designed for students to acquire the knowledge and skills of nursing administration, and it contents nursing management process, planning, organization, human resource management, leadership, control, and so on. 01
Introduction for Nursing Employment
本課程旨在協助學生未來能順利的適應職涯的環境，透過討論、講授、參與職涯講座、資料搜尋、自學及分組報告等方式，認識台灣各層級醫院、優質護理職場之條件、職場相關議題和護理新鮮人可能面臨的問題，進而協助學生能有適當的選擇就業職場
The purpose of the course is to guide and prepare students for the practicum of obtaining nursing employment. Through lecturing and discussion, students will be familiar with the purposes and agendas of the practicum, and knowing how to prepare themselves in advance to facilitate their learning during the practicum. Through the preparation of the course, students are expected to be able to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in nursing practice. In together with the practicum for obtaining nursing employment, this course is aimed to develop students’ clinical competence in providing evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care.

01
Medical-Surgical Nursing
本課程旨在培養學生運用批判性思考及護理過程技能於臨床照護對象照顧，重點在於增進學生統整運用內外科護理學知識，著重感染控制、慢性疾病照護，進行病人整體需要之評估，分析與確立照護對象的健康問題，並依照護對象的身心狀況及個別需要，提供具關懷態度之專業護理服務。透過小組分組討論方式，培養學生主動學習及與他人合作學習的能力，藉由案例分析學習全人照護、辨識臨床常見的倫理困境、體認護理人員在內外科護理情境中可扮演的角色與功能，並對未來臨床實務發展趨勢進一步認識。
This course is designed to train the students to apply critical thinking skills and nursing procedures on the clinical practice. The key point is to enhance their skill of integrating medical and surgical nursing knowledge, especially for infection control and chronic illness and conduct the needed medical and surgical evaluations for patients. At the same time, they should be able to analyze patients’ health problems and their consequences, and provide professional nursing services based on each patient’s physical/psychological development and individual needs. Through group discussion, this course cultivates students’ skills of active learning and team work. Through cases analysis, students will learn about holistic care, nurses’ possible roles and functions in medical and surgical fields as well as the future trend of clinical practice.
第1~7週

Clinical Practice of Medical-Surgical Nursing
本實習課程主要是協助學生整合內外科護理學知識應用於臨床情境中，培養學生運用批判性思考及護理過程技能於臨床病人照顧。實習中學生能評估病人身體、心理、社會調適過程中所出現的不適應行為，確立病人的健康問題，應用所學的知識擬定及執行個別性的護理措施，並針對所提供護理服務進行評值。學生在實習過程中，應主動參與醫療團隊之溝通及合作事項，同時對於內外科疾病情境中，護理人員所扮演角色功能進行批判，並能分享臨床實習之感受與角色適應，以做為未來就業的準備。
This practicum is designed to help students integrate and apply the knowledge in medical/surgical nursing on clinical situations. It also helps students apply the skills of critical thinking in the processes of nursing care. In the practicum, students should learn to evaluate the inadaptability in a patient’s physical, psychological, and social adjustments, verify a patient’s health problems, used the acquired knowledge to formulate and carry out customized nursing interventions, and evaluate the nursing interventions. During the practicum, students should actively participate in the communication and collaboration process with the medical teams, evaluate nurses’ roles in medical/surgical illnesses, and share their feelings in practicum and role adaptation in order to prepare for the future.
第8~12週

Psychiatric-Mental Health Nursing
本課程旨在培養二年制學生具備執行精神衛生護理的基本知能。課程內容包括我國精神衛生有關的政策、法律、業務與推展現況、基本理念和常用的精神衛生照護處置；如治療性溝通、精神衛生護理評估與處置、同理心、環境治療、團體動力及家庭動力等。學生藉著小組討論、影片欣賞、專題演講、案例分析及模擬情境練習等活動，整合習得的相關知能、增進精神衛生護理實務處置態度與技能。
This course provides nursing students with the essential knowledge and skills about psychiatric mental health nursing care. The major elements include the policies, laws, regulations, theories and skills of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, and missions of psychiatric nursing organizations. Students are required to identify and establish their own philosophy of nursing as well as to recognize psychiatric mental health nurse’s roles and functions.  Nursing assessment, 
interventions and evaluation used by psychiatric clinicians are presented and discussed in this class.
第1~7週

01
Practicum on Psychiatric-Mental Health Nursing
本實習課程旨在協助學生應用壓力適應模式與精神衛生護理相關理論，提供個案精神衛生之基本照顧活動與服務。透過實習活動，學生能與個案建立治療性人際關係，進行整體性護理評估與診斷，提供個別性的精神衛生照顧與護理指導。經由實習之教學活動，學生能體察到精神衛生護理人員的角色與功能、認識與精神衛生相關的法律知識、瞭解社區資源與團體動力在治療上的運作，進而體會到精神衛生對個人健康的重要性，並展現自我覺察、自治、自學的態度。
The course is to enhance the registered nurse students of two-year program with the 
problem solving skills on  psychiatric mental health  nursing interventions. A learning 
contract is  used  as a tool by nurse faculty to assist the nurse students to achieve the 
course objectives. The  major experiences obtained by students  include therapeutic 
relationship, self-assertive training, group process, milieu therapy, various modalities of 
psychiatric treatment, crisis intervention,  case transferring process, cooperative 
strategies used by medical team members, and decision making on the ethical and legal 
issues of psychiatric-mental health nursing care.
第8~17週

Child Health Nursing
本課程設計是以基礎生物醫學科、一般臨床護理技能為 ，內容「家庭中心」及「兒童發展理論為主軸，探討各年齡層生、社會常見之健康議題，透過講述、小組案例分析模擬嬰兒照顧 (兒科照護技術 )、「兒童用藥安全」數位平台課程及測驗、數位教學平討論等多元策略，培養生具備兒童照護知識與技能關懷及批判思考能力，發揮溝通合作與培養終身學習之能力。

Community Health Nursing
本課程提供學生以社區為整體，以家庭為服務的基本單位之社區衛生護理相關概念，奠定學生從事社區衛生護理工作的學理基礎。課程單元包括緒論、健康促進、社區健康評估及分析、社區健康計劃、各年齡群人口特性及健康需求、家庭健康評估及護理、傳染病防治、團體健康、居家護理等。
This course is designed to provide the theoretical foundation of community health nursing. The course contents include family assessment and family nursing, community assessment and diagnosis and visit diverse community health units , students may pride integrated individual and family care, and become very sensitively to the community health problems, using the community resources to achieve community development.
第1~7週

Dementia care
本課程主要在介紹失智症的症狀、診斷與分期，問題行為精神症狀的照護、如何與失智長輩溝通、活動安排、環境設計與個人中心照顧倫理。另外，也涵蓋了照顧者的壓力與調適、相關照護資源介紹。課程進行方式除講授法之外，透過照護活動實際練習與生命故事書的製作與分享，期待學生能於臨床照顧實務過程中，展現專業能力。(待修正)
The purpose of this course is to help students to gain knowledge and skill that related to the care for the dementia population and their caregivers. This course addresses the pressing need to develop skills in understanding and caring for people with dementia. This course will also study what dementia is and the experience of living with dementia; how cultures of residential care can be improved to put the needs of people with dementia at the centre of care; and some of the difficult issues that arise for people with dementia near the end of their life.

01
Communication Topics in Long-term Care
在長期照護場域中，無效溝通經常導致家屬與長照專業人員之間的誤會、挫折或緊張，亦可能使得受照顧的老人遭遇不必要的健康後果或不良事件。這些溝通上的挑戰可部分歸因於老人與家庭照顧者的健康識能不足。在此脈絡下，健康識能的挑戰包括能否瞭解並運用現有長期照護服務及支持措施，也可擴展至照顧決策時存在的資訊不對稱議題，影響了老年人能否在原有的社區環境中維持其健康狀態及生活模式。
為了避免無效溝通並確保長期照護之良好品質，必須讓學生及早接觸與理解，並指導學生學習達成良好溝通的適當技巧，以縮減健康識能的落差。在本課程當中，教師將與學生共同建立長期照護場域中不同的溝通場景與對話，學生可發展有效溝通的策略與方法，並從中演練並學習如何達成有效的長期照護溝通。
In long-term care settings, ineffective communication leads to confusion,frustration, and even tension between the family and long-term workers, and also can contribute to undesired outcomes or adverse events of older adults. Part of these communication challenges can be attributed to health literacy of older adults and family caregivers. The health literacy challenges in this context include navigating and understanding long-term services and supports that are available and accessible.It can be extended for referring information asymmetry during care decision making as older persons maintain their health or lifestyle in the community.
To avoid ineffective communication and to ensure quality of care in long-term care settings, it is crucial to bridge the health literacy gap by exposing our students to those contexts and instructing them in proper skills of better communication. During the course, students will work with the instructor to develop communication scenarios in long-term care settings. Students can construct ways of effective
communication and learn from how it can be proceeded.
全18週

Overview of Long-Term Care Practicum Work
本科目為長期照護實務工作專業的入門課程，望藉由理論介紹與實務分享，引領學生進入長期照護實務工作專業的世界。本課程會介紹長期照護體系，及長期照護工作可以運用於各種不同的領域及場域，並激發學生思考瞭解自己與長期照護服務的連接性，以為未來進階服務做準備。(待修正)
This is the introductory course for entering the long-term care practice. The lecturer shares related theories and practical experience for guiding the students to understand the real situations of the long-term care. The course introduces the system of long-term care and a variety of fields and setting in the long-term care. Moreover, the purpose of the course is to encourage the students to think the relationship between themselves and the services of long-term care in order to preparing themselves to enter the advanced practice.

Family Dynamic
本課程以家庭系統理論為基礎，介紹家庭中成員彼此之關係變化與動力，並進而協助學生了解家庭對個人的影響。內容包括:婚姻歷程、親職與手足、家庭溝通、家庭凝聚與自我發展、親密界線、壓力反應、危機調適等，協助了解長期照護與家庭動力間的互動關係與應用。(待修正)
Based on the family system theory, the course is to introduce the dynamic relation among family members, and explore the interaction process between individual and family in long term care situations. The following topics will be included: the process of marriage life, parental relation, the communication in the family, differentiation and separation, ego boundary, stress coping and crisis adjustment in the caregiving process.

Philosophy and Religion
本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
Although philosophy and religion are two oldest fields of human culture, their influences are up to now still impressive. This course offers the basic knowledge of the two disciplines, including not only philosophy and religion themselves, but also a philosophical reflection on religion.
This course introduces the brief development histories and contents of the oriental and occidental philosophies. It gives also a discourse on issues of the origin of religion and the central dogmas of a few world religions, such as Buddhism, Christianity and Islam. In order to make the learners better to understand their own cultural circumstances, the present religious state in Taiwan will be discussed too. As for the philosophy of religion, the dialectics of faith and reason and the relation between ethics and religion will be particularly emphasized.
全18週

Environmental Sustainability and Information Science
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
This course focuses on the importance of sustainable environmental development and information science. By integrating the application of information technology, this course aims to explain the importance of sustainable environmental development and to raise students' awareness of sustainable development in order to equip students with the ability to apply appropriate information technology and to develop the skills to maintain environmental sustainability.

The course covers topics such as environmental ethics, environmental change and disaster prevention, energy conservation and energy management, ecological conservation, computer programming, and information application integrated with environmental education themes. Teaching strategies include learning by doing, experiencing in real-life situations, cooperative learning methods, using sensory learning, exploring the environment, and integrating computer software applications.

Day Care Practice and Implementation
本課程主要以人為中心的照顧作為核心理念與指引，旨在培養學習者具備以人為中心的需求評估及活動設計的能力，並將之應用於日間照顧使用者。課程內容涵蓋介紹人口變遷與日間照護發展的關連、日間照護服務範疇與實務、品質管理及相關法規、家屬參與及溝通、以及需求評估及活動設計評估等議題。課程進行方式除講授法之外，也透過實際進行需求評估及活動設計等實作活動，期待學生能於照顧實作過程中，展現專業照顧能力。
This course focuses on personal-centered care as a core concept and guide. Students will learn about personal-centered day care needs assessment and day care activities. The course also covers topics such as the relationship between population change and day care development, the scope and practice of day care services, quality. In addition to the lecture teaching method, the course conducts practical activities such as needs assessment and day care activities through the day care center. Students will be expected to demonstrate professional care during the care process.
第1~14週

01
End-of-life Care in Long-Term Care
本課程的設計旨在協助學生正視個人生涯或職場中，可能面對的生命、痛苦 與死亡的課題。本課程期能引導學生從人生哲學、生死觀、價值觀、與意義觀 等人文角度探討生死課題、探索對生命的體認，同時對生活周遭一切進行反思。 本課程除期能提供學生進一步瞭解長期照護個案之臨終照護議題重要性外，也 將透過實務安寧療護經驗分享與知識傳遞，讓學生體認長期照護服務實務中尊 重生命體與生死議題的態度與思維準備。
The course aims at students are: first, to learn from their personal experiences toward death or caring dying family members; second, students can open their heart to discuss the fears and anxieties of death and dying. From this course, students can be truly care and be empathetic with dying process especially in helping dying person and their families to facing the end stage of life in different long term care services.

They can also realize the role functions of profession in long term care and share with themselves feeling and role adjustment in long term care setting.

本課程的主要目的是學習居家照顧服務督導員的督導功能和角色。包括學習服務方案管理的知能和技巧（需求評估、方案內容規劃、服務過程評估、服務品質確保、和成效評估），個案問題分類與因應（應用理論，區分問題，研議因應原則）、督導技巧（專業關係、團體動力、督導介入）、老人和身心障礙者周全性評估、照顧管理專員的功能角色和專業知能。
The purpose of this course is to learn intensive and advanced supervisory skills. Students are required to become familiar with program planning, constructing, and evaluation skills.  They will be exposed to the knowledge of service quality assurance. They are required to learn the categorize problems and needs of intended clients. The learning of supervisory skills is also included, including the formation of professional alliance with the clients, an evaluation and management of group dynamics for home helpers, Students are also to learn the integrated care model for the elders and disabled clients. The last goal of learning pertains to the role and function of care managers in long-term care management centers.

Extraction rules and application of large health database: cancer as an example
本課程旨在訓練學生習得癌症登記相關醫學字辭、癌症登記摘錄內容邏輯、範疇、摘錄規則與

This course provides an introduction to the cancer registry and the cancer registrar 
profession. It will include the types of registries; central and hospital based legal 
and ethical standards, cancer registry management functions and operations. Emphasis 
will be placed on standard setting organizations. Additionally, Introduction to cancer 
statistics, internal and external reporting requirements, annual report preparation, 
use of comparative databases in data analysis, participation in special studies, 
presentation of cancer registry data, usefulness of statistical cancer data in a 
healthcare organization.

General Concepts and Quality Control of Drugs
本課程主要內容是介紹藥物由來、劑型、劑量、新藥品上市許可之流程、藥
品開發過程之優良藥品製作規範(GMP & CGMP)與品質管理、優良人體細胞
組織操作規範(GTP)、優良臨床試驗操作規範(GCP)、藥品與醫療器材管理法
規、常用藥物之作用原理，藥品動力、藥物與食物間之交互作用、用藥安全
需知及藥物中毒之解毒等；常用藥物簡介包括：神經系統相關藥物、影響內
分泌及新陳代謝藥物、心臟血管疾病用藥、消化系統藥物、感染和癌症之化
學治療藥物等。
The course is a two credit hours course and design especially for undergraduate student of
Health Care Management. This curriculum emphasizes on the general concepts of drugs, process of
new drug marketing, good manufacturing practice and quality control, good tissue practice, good
clinical practice, regulations of drug and medical equipment management, general concepts of drug
pharmacokinetics, drugs and food interaction, safety of drugs and antidote of drugs. The curriculum
trends will start from more details and bring a completely drug concepts. The subjects include
general used-drugs affecting on the respiratory disease, cardiovascular disease, gastrointestinal
disorder, , urinary-bladder disorder, mental disorder, and endocrine disorder.

Biostatistics II
本課程延續前一學期之生物統計學(一)，藉電腦 Excel 中之資料分析套裝軟
體進一步加強學生基本生物統計學應用的實務操作，以使學生具備從事健康
事業管理相關工作及協助研究的基本工具與電腦軟體操作實務。課程內容著
重於推論統計學的 t 檢定、卡方檢定、變異數分析、簡單及複迴歸分析、相
關，與其電腦 Excel 實作；學生主要在引導下依個人興趣個別自選統計主題

The objective of this course is to provide students with practical experience on
the application of biostatistical theories by data analysis of Excel, a tool for the
work and research in the health related fields. Students are trained and guided
and can practice individually to run statistical software by computer in the
computer classroom. The homework and tests are mainly according to students’
interested statistical topic by their own selection. Topics taught in this course
further emphasize on inferential statistics that mainly include hypothesis testing, 
t tests, chi?square tests, analysis of variance, regression analysis, correlation
analysis, and related practice by Excel.

Introduction to Contemporary Art
本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。
This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.
全18週

Philosophy and Religion
本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
This course is designed according to the vertical and the horizontal aspects of life. Guide students to understand the fundamental content of philosophy and religion, and focus on the various philosophical theories and religious teachings. "Birth, aging, sickness and death" and "oneself, humans, and subjects around one’s life" will be linked together in this course. The characteristics and values of human beings, human's desires and troubles, right and wrong, good and evil, and etc. will be explored. The attitudes on life, values, knowledge, ethics, morality, religion and life and death will be examined. For cultivating positive and active concept, students have to integrate his/her knowledge, feelings, and intentions. May they be happy and healthy and establish a good philosophical contemplation and religious reflection, and in an appropriate direction of life which profits both themselves and other lives through the learning of this course
